docs.snippet: Social media plays a vital role in our journalism. But we also need to make sure that we are engaging responsibly.

docs.snippet: There’s a new class of social-media celebrities, and they’re not old enough for kindergarten. Welcome to the weird, lucrative world of viral toddler videos.

docs.snippet: This week’s newsletter brings us to Papua New Guinea, with more coverage to come.
